definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Youth is the freshness of the deep spring of life!
sentences.chinese: 青春是生命春意正濃的鮮活記憶。

sentences.english: Mountains and rivers show smile, one feather, opened the bright spring.
sentences.chinese: 山河展笑，一心若羽，開啓了明媚的春意。

sentences.english: The red apricots on spring branches are the witness to your diligent sweat.
sentences.chinese: 看那枝頭紅杏春意鬧，是您辛勤的汗水澆灌。

sentences.english: Happiness is the prairie in spring, seeing a spring idea full of life, the butterfly dances.
sentences.chinese: 幸福是在春天的原野，看春意盎然，蝶舞翩躚。

sentences.english: It is the deep spring of life.
sentences.chinese: 它是一生中春意正濃的時期。

sentences.english: Too many flowers, though each shall crown the year?
sentences.chinese: 太多的花，即使每朵洋溢着春意？

sentences.english: In May, the trees make a pleasant shade and spring is in the air in Bucharest.
sentences.chinese: 5月的布加勒斯特，綠樹成陰，春意盎然。

sentences.english: After a long cold winter, spring scenes look particularly lovely outside.
sentences.chinese: 走過冬日的嚴寒，窗外星星點點的春意顯得分外可愛。

sentences.english: We can breathe a touch of spring in the air now.
sentences.chinese: 我們能呼吸到空氣中的一絲春意。

sentences.english: Is it any wonder that people fall in love in the springtime?
sentences.chinese: 在春意盎然之時人們墜入愛河，這有什麼奇怪的？

sentences.english: Smoke fog wrapped around it, spring cozy office fence.
sentences.chinese: 它煙纏霧繞，春意融融籬笆處。

sentences.english: Say human 3 April, behold spring where.
sentences.chinese: 莫道人間三四月，誰知春意在何方。

sentences.english: On pink apricot branches spring is running wild.

definition: Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
scenes of springtime/the radiance of spring/(fig.) a sight of sth sexy or erotic/an indication of a love affair
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
everything in the garden is lovely
(of a woman, a flower etc) delicate colors
